name: Crow Pose (Bakasana)
desc: Balance on your hands with knees tucked into armpits. Massive wrist and core challenge.

name: L-Sit (Floor)
desc: Sit with legs straight. Lift your entire body off the floor using only your hands. Core fire.

name: Pelvic Tilt (Supine)
desc: Lie on back. Flatten your lower back into the floor, then arch it. Deep pelvic control.

name: Warrior III (Dynamic)
desc: Balance on one leg, body like a 'T'. Swing arms from sides to overhead without wobbling.

name: Dead Bug (Slow & Heavy)
desc: Lower opposite arm/leg. Take 10 seconds to go down. Keep back glued to floor.

name: Plank to Pike Pushup
desc: From plank, push hips high into a V, then perform a pushup targeting the shoulders.

name: Cossack Squat to Side Plank
desc: Drop into a deep side lunge, then transition your weight into a side plank on that same side.

name: Pigeon Pose (Active Lift)
desc: In pigeon, lift your chest and hands. Use your glutes to keep you upright. No leaning.

name: The 'Hollow' Rock
desc: Lie on back, arms and legs reaching out. Rock back and forth while maintaining a banana shape.

name: Chair Pose (Toe Balance)
desc: Deep squat with feet together. Lift heels as high as possible. Hold for 30 seconds.

name: Single-Leg Glute Bridge (Pulse)
desc: One leg up. Drive through the heel of the floor-leg. Pulse at the top of the range.

name: Scapular Pull-up (Floor)
desc: In plank. Move your chest toward the floor, then push it as far away as possible. Don't bend elbows.

name: Boat Pose (Twisting)
desc: Balance on your sits-bones, legs up. Rotate your torso side to side. Hits the obliques.

name: Reverse Tabletop (One Leg)
desc: Hips up, chest to sky. Lift one leg straight up. Massive shoulder and glute stability.

name: Side Plank (Star Reach)
desc: In side plank, lift your top leg and top arm. Hold the 'star' shape for 20 seconds.

name: Downward Dog to Cobra Flow
desc: Ripple through the spine from a V-shape down into a low back extension. Fluid motion.

name: Eagle Pose (Standing Balance)
desc: Wrap one leg over the other, wrap arms. Sit deep. Stretches the back of the shoulders.

name: Tucked Knee Hang
desc: Hang from a bar. Pull knees to chest and hold. Pelvic floor and lower abs.

name: Kneeling Side Kick
desc: On one knee and one hand. Kick the other leg out to the side. Glute medius burner.

name: The 'Cat-Cow' Plank
desc: In a full plank, try to arch and round your back. Tiny, high-tension movement.

name: Half-Moon Pose (Ardha Chandrasana)
desc: One hand on floor, one leg up, body rotated open. Ultimate balance and hip opener.

name: Mountain Climber (Spider)
desc: In plank, bring your knee to the OUTSIDE of your elbow. Hold for 2 seconds.

name: Dolphin Pose
desc: Like downward dog but on your forearms. Increases shoulder mobility for handstands.

name: Glute Bridge (Marching)
desc: Hold a bridge. Lift one foot, then the other. Do not let your hips tilt or drop.

name: V-Sit Hold
desc: Sit with legs and torso forming a V. Reach for your toes. Spine must stay straight.

name: Wild Thing (Flipped Dog)
desc: From downward dog, step one foot over and flip into a one-arm backbend.

name: Kneeling Pelvic Circles
desc: On all fours. Move only your pelvis in a circle. Like a slow-motion belly dance.

name: Plank (Hip Dips)
desc: In plank, rotate hips to touch the floor on the left, then the right. Oblique mobility.

name: Malasana (Squat) Twist
desc: Deep squat. One hand on floor, reach other to sky. Look at the top hand.

name: Single Leg RDL (Hand Switch)
desc: Hinge on one leg. Reach forward with one arm, then switch to the other while holding balance.

name: Superman (Alternating)
desc: On stomach. Lift right arm and left leg. Hold 2s. Switch. Low back health.

name: Side Lying Leg Circles
desc: On your side. Lift top leg and draw small, fast circles. Don't let your torso move.

name: Wall Walk-ups
desc: Start in plank with feet at wall. Walk your feet up the wall into a handstand. Shoulder power.

name: Butterfly (Active Press)
desc: Sit with feet together. Try to push your knees to the floor using only your hip muscles.

name: Forearm Plank (Saw)
desc: In forearm plank, shift your body forward and back using your toes. Shoulder stability.

name: Low Lunge (Twist and Reach)
desc: Lunge. Back knee down. Reach for your back heel with the opposite hand.

name: Bird-Dog (Crunch)
desc: Extend opposite arm/leg. Crunch under your body and touch elbow to knee. Repeat.

name: Standing Knee to Chest (Eyes Closed)
desc: Balance on one leg, pull other knee to chest. Close eyes. Massive balance challenge.

name: Prone Breaststroke
desc: On stomach. Lift chest. Move arms as if swimming breaststroke. Upper back mobility.

name: Bridge (Heel Walk-outs)
desc: From bridge, walk your heels out as far as possible, then walk them back in.

name: Scale Pose (Tolasana)
desc: Cross legs (lotus if possible). Lift your whole body off the floor using hands.

name: Pelvic Floor Isometrics
desc: Squeeze and lift the pelvic floor. Hold 10s. Release. Foundation of core stability.

name: Side Plank (Knee to Elbow)
desc: In side plank, crunch your top knee and top elbow together. Balance and obliques.

name: Frog Pose (Static)
desc: Knees wide, feet out. Hold the deep stretch. Breathe into the adductors.

name: Cobra (Shoulder Rolls)
desc: In cobra pose, roll your shoulders forward and back. Loosens the chest/neck.

name: Skater Squat (Slow)
desc: Squat on one leg, touching the other knee to the floor behind you. Control the descent.

name: Warrior I (Backbend)
desc: High lunge. Reach arms up and slightly back. Feel the stretch in the back-leg hip flexor.

name: Bear Crawl (Static Hover)
desc: On all fours, knees 1 inch off floor. Hold for 60 seconds. Full body tension.

name: Seated Pancake (Twist)
desc: Sit legs wide. Reach one hand to opposite foot, other arm behind your back.

name: Thread the Needle (Plank)
desc: In a high plank, reach one arm under your body and through. Switch sides.

name: Reverse Plank Bridge
desc: Fingers toward heels. Drive hips up. Look at the ceiling. Stretch the front shoulders.

name: Happy Baby (Adductor Stretch)
desc: On back, grab feet. Try to straighten your legs while holding your feet. Deep groin stretch.

name: Single Leg Calf Raise (Yoga Style)
desc: Perform calf raises while in a 'tree pose' balance. Total ankle and hip integration.

name: Superman (W-Shape)
desc: On stomach. Lift chest. Pull elbows to ribs in a W-shape. Squeeze shoulder blades.

name: Crab Walk (High Hips)
desc: Walk in crab position but keep your hips as high as possible. Hard on the triceps.

name: Child's Pose to Push-up
desc: From child's pose, ripple forward into a push-up, then push back. Dynamic flow.

name: Standing Side Lean (Interlaced)
desc: Interlace fingers, palms up. Reach high and lean to the side. Stretch the lateral line.

name: Plank (Arm Lift)
desc: In plank, lift one arm straight forward. Do not let your shoulders rotate.

name: Sphinx Pose (Neck Circles)
desc: On forearms, chest up. Slowly rotate your head in a full circle. Relieves neck tension.

name: L-Sit (Tucked)
desc: Easier version of L-Sit. Pull knees to chest while lifting butt off floor with hands.

name: Triangle Pose (Trikonasana)
desc: Wide stance. Reach down to one ankle, other hand to sky. Side body and hamstring.

name: Kneeling Psoas Stretch (Arm Reach)
desc: Lunge, knee down. Reach arm of the back leg up and lean away from that leg.

name: Dead Bug (Weighted Feel)
desc: Dead bug, but imagine you are pushing through thick mud. High internal tension.

name: Wall Sit (Shoulder Press)
desc: Perform a wall sit. While sitting, perform overhead press motions against the wall.

name: Wide Leg Forward Fold (Twist)
desc: Fold forward with wide legs. Hand on floor in center, reach other to sky.

name: Side Plank (Leg Lift Circles)
desc: In side plank, lift the top leg and draw tiny circles. Intense hip stability.

name: Cat-Cow (Elbows Down)
desc: Perform cat-cow while on your forearms. Targets the middle (thoracic) spine.

name: Single Leg Stand (Knee Circles)
desc: Balance on one leg. Draw a circle in the air with the other knee. Lubricates hip.

name: Prone Leg Lifts
desc: On stomach. Lift one straight leg as high as possible. Don't arch your back. Pure glute.

name: Reverse Crunch (Pelvic Lift)
desc: On back, legs in air. Lift your tailbone off the floor using only lower abs.

name: Upward Dog (Active Legs)
desc: Push up, look up. Squeeze your quads so your knees lift off the floor. Full front stretch.

name: Forward Fold (Heel Lift)
desc: In a standing forward fold, shift your weight onto your toes and lift your heels.

name: Side Lying Clamshell (Elevated)
desc: On side, lift both feet off floor. Perform clamshells (open knees) from there.

name: Warrior II (Shoulder CARs)
desc: Hold Warrior II. While holding, rotate your arms in giant circles from the shoulder.

name: Bear Crawl (Backward Flow)
desc: Move backward in bear crawl. This targets the shoulders and triceps differently.

name: Pyramid Pose (Active)
desc: One foot forward, one back. Fold over front leg. Lift hands to small of back.

name: Plank (Leg Reach)
desc: In plank, lift one leg and reach it 45 degrees to the side. Tap floor, return.

name: Seated Spinal Twist (Open)
desc: Sit, knees bent. Reach one arm behind you, other arm to opposite knee. Open chest.

name: Standing Figure-4 (Pulse)
desc: Balance, ankle over knee. Sit back into a squat. Pulse gently at the bottom.

name: Goddess Pose (Heel Taps)
desc: Wide squat, toes out. Alternate lifting heels as fast as possible. Calf and inner thigh.

name: Fish Pose (Matsyasana)
desc: On back. Arch your chest toward the sky, rest the top of your head on the floor.

name: Single Leg Deadlift (Airplane)
desc: Hinge on one leg. Reach arms out to the sides like wings. Rotate torso slowly.

name: Wall Slide (L-Shape)
desc: Back to wall. Arms in an L-shape (90 deg). Slide them up and down, keeping elbows flat.

name: Prone Hand Hovers
desc: On stomach. Lift hands off floor. Move them from your head to your hips and back.

name: Bridge (One Leg March)
desc: In a glute bridge, pull one knee to chest, then switch. Keep hips level at all times.

name: Downward Dog (Single Leg)
desc: Reach one leg high into the air. Try to keep your shoulders square to the floor.

name: Side Plank (Bottom Leg Lift)
desc: Side plank with top foot on floor behind you. Lift the bottom leg. Inner thigh fire.

name: Cobra (Thoracic Focus)
desc: Push up into a small cobra. Focus on pulling your chest forward through your arms.

name: Standing Quad Stretch (Active)
desc: Hold your foot for a quad stretch. Now try to let go of the foot but keep the leg in place.

name: Reverse Tabletop (Walk-outs)
desc: In reverse tabletop, walk your feet forward and back. Keeps the shoulders moving.

name: Plow Pose (Halasana)
desc: On back. Bring legs over your head until toes touch the floor behind you. Spine stretch.

name: Single Leg Balance (Hip Circles)
desc: Balance on one leg. Move the other hip in a giant circle. Don't touch the floor.

name: Side Plank (Top Arm Reach)
desc: In side plank, reach your top arm over your head, parallel to the floor. Long side stretch.

name: Boat Pose (Low to High)
desc: Move from a low boat (legs/back near floor) to a high boat (V-shape). Core flow.

name: Cat-Cow (Side to Side)
desc: On all fours. Move your hips and head toward each other on the same side. C-shape spine.

name: Downward Dog (Elbow Taps)
desc: In downward dog, try to touch your elbows to the floor simultaneously. Lat mobility.

name: Plank (Forearm to Hand)
desc: Move from a forearm plank to a high plank and back. Keep your hips from swaying.

name: Standing Side Bend (Overhead)
desc: Reach both arms high. Grab your right wrist with your left hand. Pull and lean.

name: Reverse Tabletop (Knee Tucks)
desc: In reverse tabletop, pull one knee to your chest. Hold 2s. Switch sides.

name: The Final Breath (Lionâ€™s Breath)
desc: Inhale deep. Exhale hard through your mouth with your tongue out. Face and jaw relief.
